features.name: View Deleted Pages
features.description: Display a list of all deleted pages with thumbnail previews, hierarchical structure, and deletion date information.
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Recycle Bin > Pages Tab
test_scenarios: View list of deleted pages with correct hierarchy
Verify page thumbnails display correctly
Check pagination works for large number of deleted pages
Verify deleted date is displayed accurately
Test hover preview functionality for page thumbnails
Verify child pages are shown under parent pages
Test that pages with special permissions are handled correctly

features.name: Restore Deleted Pages
features.description: Restore one or multiple deleted pages back to their original location in the site structure.
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Recycle Bin > Pages Tab > Restore Button
test_scenarios: Restore single page successfully
Restore multiple pages using bulk selection
Verify page is restored to correct location in hierarchy
Test restoration of page with child pages
Verify error handling when parent page is missing
Check permissions are preserved after restoration
Test restoration fails gracefully for pages without proper permissions

features.name: Permanently Delete Pages
features.description: Permanently remove deleted pages from the system, including all associated data and thumbnails.
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Recycle Bin > Pages Tab > Delete Button
test_scenarios: Delete single page permanently
Delete multiple pages using bulk selection
Verify page thumbnails are deleted
Test deletion of pages with child pages
Verify confirmation dialog appears before deletion
Check that deleted pages cannot be recovered
Test error handling for pages that cannot be deleted

features.name: View Deleted Modules
features.description: Display a list of all deleted modules with their title, associated page, and deletion date.
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Recycle Bin > Modules Tab
test_scenarios: View list of deleted modules
Verify module title and page name display correctly
Check pagination for large number of modules
Test modules from deleted pages show as disabled
Verify deletion date displays accurately
Check tooltip displays for modules on deleted pages

features.name: Restore Deleted Modules
features.description: Restore deleted modules back to their original pages, with validation for page availability.
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Recycle Bin > Modules Tab > Restore Button
test_scenarios: Restore single module to existing page
Restore multiple modules using bulk selection
Verify module cannot be restored if parent page is deleted
Test module permissions are preserved
Verify module settings are retained after restoration
Check error handling for invalid module restoration

features.name: Permanently Delete Modules
features.description: Permanently remove deleted modules from the system including all associated content.
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Recycle Bin > Modules Tab > Delete Button
test_scenarios: Delete single module permanently
Delete multiple modules using bulk selection
Verify module content is completely removed
Test deletion of modules from deleted pages
Check confirmation dialog before deletion
Verify deleted modules cannot be recovered

Verify deletion date displays accurately

Check sorting functionality if available

features.name: Restore Deleted Users

test_scenarios: Restore single user account
Restore multiple users using bulk selection
Verify user profile information is preserved
Test user roles are maintained after restoration
Check user can login after restoration
Verify error handling for invalid user restoration

features.name: Permanently Delete Users

test_scenarios: Delete single user permanently
Delete multiple users using bulk selection
